CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting options to control participants' ability to admit attendees from meeting lobby
OldVersion.description: Meeting organizers will have options in the meeting settings on who can admit attendees from the lobby into the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Show Chat info in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Chat users can have access to contextual information including members, pinned messages, shared files and links, and entry point to contextual search from this canvas.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Show Chat info in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: Chat users can have access to contextual information including members, pinned messages, shared files and links, and entry point to contextual search from this canvas.

CurrentVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
CurrentVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

OldVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
OldVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Open attachments in desktop apps from the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In the new Outlook for Windows, users can now open attachments of all types in their respective desktop app by double clicking them. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Open attachments in desktop apps from the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: In the new Outlook for Windows, users can now open attachments of all types in their respective desktop app by double clicking them. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Multi-Account Support for Add-Ins and Apps in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, new Outlook for for Windows supports apps and add-ins for the user's primary account only. We will be enabling apps and add-ins to be supported across all of the accounts added to new Outlook, dynamically switching to the active identity. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Multi-Account Support for Add-Ins and Apps in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Currently, new Outlook for for Windows supports apps and add-ins for the user's primary account only. We will be enabling apps and add-ins to be supported across all of the accounts added to new Outlook, dynamically switching to the active identity. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
OldVersion.description: Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to sort meeting attendees in the tracking list alphabetically. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Sort Meeting Attendees
OldVersion.description: Allow user to sort meeting attendees in the tracking list alphabetically. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Meeting Attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Allow user to filter meeting attendees by name in the tracking list. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Filter Meeting Attendees
OldVersion.description: Allow user to filter meeting attendees by name in the tracking list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
OldVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can turn off copying or forwarding of live captions, transcript, and recap for meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat’ control for meeting organizers to include live captions, transcription, and meeting recap. With this change, meeting organizers with eligible licenses will see a control called ‘Turn off copying and forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, and transcript’ in the meeting options. When this control is enabled, meeting participants won’t be able to copy the meeting chat, live captions, live transcript, or any insights generated from intelligent meeting recap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can turn off copying or forwarding of live captions, transcript, and recap for meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat’ control for meeting organizers to include live captions, transcription, and meeting recap. With this change, meeting organizers with eligible licenses will see a control called ‘Turn off copying and forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, and transcript’ in the meeting options. When this control is enabled, meeting participants won’t be able to copy the meeting chat, live captions, live transcript, or any insights generated from intelligent meeting recap.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
OldVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Departed user content workflows for user-owned Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Manage retention and deletion workflows for user-owned Loop workspaces like Copilot Pages when users leave the organization. Notify and provide temporary access to other employees or administrators to save important data before deletion policies take effect.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin management tasks enabled for all Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can manage membership, ownership, deletion, and restoration of Loop workspaces in the SharePoint Embedded admin center or PowerShell. These changes are visible within the Loop experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop guest sharing via Entra B2B configuration for organizations with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Enable B2B guest sharing for Loop workspaces, pages, and components, subject to administrator policy. This allows sharing with people outside your tenant and now includes organizations that utilize sensitivity labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - User accessible recycle bin for Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: When users delete a Loop workspace, owners can restore it from a recycle bin in Loop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Workplace check-in with Workplace Presence
CurrentVersion.description: With Workplace Presence, employees will have the ability to check in to the office in Outlook, Teams, and Places to confirm their work plans, receive check-in reminders, and view others nearby and who planned to come in. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Intelligent suggestions in calendar
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent suggestions will appear in calendar peek cards and the Places people pages when users have actions to complete to organize their day. Users will be prompted to "quick book" rooms for in-person meetings and desks for in-office days. They will also see recommendations to update their work location to "Office" when needed for in-person events.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Office Files on Hold
CurrentVersion.description: If a tenant has the (EnableHoldTheFile) GPO enabled, and the end users run into Office file conflicts, then end users can open the file in Office to merge changes. If a tenant has the GPO disabled, and the end users run into Office file conflicts, then OneDrive automatically creates a copy of the file in conflict. When tenants have this GPO disabled, it leads to end users potentially having to manually merge hundreds of conflicts because OneDrive automatically forks a file instead of allowing the users to have the option to merge conflicts in Office. The proposal no longer allows tenants to disable this GPO thus not automatically forking a file when in conflict for end users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Places is an AI-powered workplace app for flexible work, empowering hybrid employees to foster in-office collaboration and leveraging insights into space optimization. Places intelligently allows you to coordinate your hybrid team to make the most of in-office days, modernize how employees make connections, and optimize space management with occupancy and utilization data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
OldVersion.description: Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Additional features on the profile card in Outlook Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Reachability panel, hybrid location, and pronouns (read only) will be available on the Outlook profile card in iOS and Android. Events panel will be replaced with the calendar in Outlook mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.
